code: import{ActionTypes}from"../constants/action_types";export var setCategories=function setCategories(categories){return{type:ActionTypes.SET_BOOK_CATEGORIES,payload:categories};};export var removeSelectedCategory=function removeSelectedCategory(){return{type:ActionTypes.REMOVE_SELECTED_BOOK_CATEGORY};};export var selectedBooks=function selectedBooks(books){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECTED_BOOKS,payload:books};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(loading){return{type:ActionTypes.SET_LOADING,payload:loading};};
